resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/103293</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>103293</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770201851</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">It's the Law </string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Es ist das Gesetz</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">C'est la loi</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">É a lei</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">È la legge</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Είναι ο νόμος</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Es la ley</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Students will research the laws relating to tobacco in their own and other jurisdictions, debating the most effective approaches.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Social Sciences</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Kursteilnehmer erforschen die Gesetze in bezug auf
Tabak in ihren Selbst- und in anderen Jurisdiktionen und debattieren 
die wirkungsvollsten Annäherungen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les étudiants rechercheront les lois concernant 
le tabac dans leurs propres et d'autres juridictions, discutant les 
approches les plus pertinentes.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Os estudantes pesquisarão as leis que 
relacionam-se ao tabaco no seus próprios e em outros jurisdições, 
debatendo as aproximações as mais eficazes.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Gli allievi ricercheranno le leggi concernente 
tabacco nei loro propri ed in altre giurisdizioni, dibattenti i metodi
più efficaci.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Οι σπουδαστές θα ερευνήσουν τους νόμους σχετικά με τον
καπνό στις και άλλες αρμοδιότητές τους, συζητώντας τις 
αποτελεσματικότερες προσεγγίσεις.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Los estudiantes investigarán los leyes referentes
a tabaco en sus el propios y otras jurisdicciones, discutiendo los 
acercamientos más eficaces.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sozialwissenschaften</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les Sciences Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciências Sociais</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienze Sociali</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κοινωνικές επιστήμες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencias Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770201851</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Free to use or adapt for educational purposes only</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>103293</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/courses/its-the-law</uri>
      </location>
    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
